[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Title"][/siteorigin_widget]
[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
One Click Demo Import

One click demo import will install Pre-Built demos with the one click

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
Powerful Theme Option

Suffice packs not only with powerfull theme option but is also customizer based theme option.

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
Fully Customizable

Suffice provides you with the highly customizable customizer option panel from where you can gain desired design.

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
Full Control

Your site be in your control. Suffice provides with you every fine detailed control of your website.

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
Responsive

Build with mobile first technology and keeping responsive on mind. Your website look as much as beutiful it looks on PC

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
Mega Menu

Number of menu items is pain to manage. Suffice care about your needs and is compatible with max mega menu.

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
Unlimited Colors

Choose your own color with built in color picker and give your site a new feel or simply choose from pre-defined colors.

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
Advanced Typography

Use 6000+ google fonts, set sizes, style, weight. Control your fonts like you want to. Change the feel

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
Wide/Boxed Layout

Choose between wide and boxed layout. Wide layout won’t set the width of website while boxed does.

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
Layout Control

Control layout of Homepage, Page, Archive, 404, User, Content, Single etc with the visual guide.

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
Widgets

With the Sufifce’s built in widgets like Button, Call to Action, Blog you can create stunning pages and even sidebar.

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
Translation Ready

Suffice is ready for translate. If you would like to translate this theme to your local language you won’t get disapointed.

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
Sidebars

Suffice has build in two sidebar Left Sidebar and Right Sidebar and also supports Shop sidebar for WooCommerce.

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
Optimized for speed

Suffice theme is coded with the speed in mind. It doesn’t loads the unecessary library and files.

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
Browser Support

Not only supports major browser but also supports Internet Explorer 9. What else do you need more?

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Image"][/siteorigin_widget]
Custom Background

Give every element background you want to either it is color or image, Suffice will make it look awesome.

[siteorigin_widget class="ST_Widget_Title"][/siteorigin_widget]

item.title: Luana
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded: Luana is mobile app that lets user use their free time for better productivity. It helps users stay focused on work and keeps them away from social networking sites.

item.title: Healito
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded: As a name says, Healito is health app specially designed for smart watches which keeps tracks of heartbeat, cholesterol and amount of fat present in user's body. It lets user have healthy habits and also help on maintaining healthy eating schedule.

item.title: Kim Garden
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded: You must be thinking about why there is garden on it's name. It is because this web application is usually designed to reduce amount of stress user bears while watching numerous lines of code. This web app is extremely helpful if you are having eyesight issues.
